about_the_game:
This DLC contains 4 beautifully crafted models that we made for those interested in Asian cultures.

Two Chinese Cheongsam costumes:
Wear one of these to become a beauty at The Bund!

Two Japanese Yukata costumes:
Wear one of these to watch the firework show!
detailed_description:
This DLC contains 4 beautifully crafted models that we made for those interested in Asian cultures.

Two Chinese Cheongsam costumes:
Wear one of these to become a beauty at The Bund!

Two Japanese Yukata costumes:
Wear one of these to watch the firework show!
name: Them and Us - Asian Costume Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Them and Us - Asian Costume Pack - $4.99

package_groups.title: Buy Them and Us - Asian Costume Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Core-i5 or an equivalent
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB Memory Minimum) | AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB Memory Minimum)
  • Additional Notes: Low FPS? Please make sure the game is running on the main monitor connected on your video card and not the onboard video card.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Core-i7 or an equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or equivalent with 4GBs of VRAM
  • Additional Notes:

short_description: This DLC contains 4 beautifully crafted models that we made for those interested in Asian cultures.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, French, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Italian, Romanian, Russian*, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
